content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that you are a student. Therefore, I can offer you a special discount for students. The normal price for the apartment is 900 Euro per month, but for students, I can offer 800 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I haven't provided any information about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sorry, my mistake. I offer you the apartment for 800 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I haven't provided any information about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I offer you the apartment for 700 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 700 Euro per month is too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 650 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 650 Euro per month is too low for this apartment. Let me offer you a price that better fits the value of the apartment. How about 850 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still a bit high for me. How about 750 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 750 Euro per month is still too low for this apartment. Let me offer you a price that better fits the value of the apartment. How about 875 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
